sourcesContent: import { Component, Input, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { NavigationService } from 'src/app/navigation.service'; import { Router } from '@angular/router'; import * as json from 'data.json'; import { PlayersService } from '../players.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-home', templateUrl: './home.component.html', styleUrls: ['./home.component.scss'] }) export class HomeComponent implements OnInit{ @Input() item: any; es : any[]=[]; constructor (public navigation: NavigationService, private router: Router , private service : PlayersService){ setTimeout(() => { this.es = service.data; console.log(this.es) }, 1000); } ngOnInit(): void {}; verJugador(id:any):void{ this.router.navigate(['players/',id]) } }
